articles.title: TikTok 'didn't store' iPhone clipboard data - BBC News
articles.description: In a new software update, Apple will alert iPhone owners when the clipboard is accessed by an app.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty
Social media platform TikTok has told the BBC it did not receive or store any data from Apple iPhone clipboards.

articles.title: Hi-tech greenhouses to supply UK stores with food - BBC News
articles.description: Warming greenhouses will use AI and waste heat from water treatment works in a world-first.
